Title: Immortal
Plot: When Tommy struggles to help Janet in a financial crunch, he must turn to his Uncle Teddy to help him out.  The new female addition to the house fights to be accepted by the guys while they do everything they can to drive her nuts.  Just as Mike is getting fed up from sleeping on the firehouse couch, he is offered a helping hand with a free place to stay... at a steep price.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: James Badge Dale,  Kaitlin Hopkins,  Natalie Distler,  Phoebe Strole,  Todd Carroll,  Dominic Marcus,  Jessica O'Donahue,  Rebecca O'Donahue,  Jenna Gavigan
